message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product is worth a bit more than $8500. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8000 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $8500. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer it to you for $8700. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $8500. Can we discuss further?
